Posts.EditableText:
I have links to every object reachable including the command bar in case of play on phone.
These are all expressions and they are even sized correctly by default, and underlined, so I can see the engine saw them as links not just text, and they do not show their verbs.

I just know that this is because I had t set to delay until one second had passed and then ask if objects were reachable. But is there any reason we can't do that, and any way we can?
Posts.HTML:
I have links to every object reachable including the command bar in case of play on phone.
These are all expressions and they are even sized correctly by default, and underlined, so I can see the engine saw them as links not just text, and they do not show their verbs.

I just know that this is because I had t set to delay until one second had passed and then ask if objects were reachable. But is there any reason we can't do that, and any way we can?
